thread.title: Rudy Giuliani Quits Law Firm, Citing Demands of Mueller Probe

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Rudy Giuliani Quits Law Firm, Citing Demands of Mueller Probe
text:
WASHINGTON—Rudy Giuliani, who last month joined the team of lawyers representing President Donald Trump in the Russia investigation, resigned from his law firm on Thursday, citing the “pressing demands” of the special counsel probe.
Mr. Giuliani said last month that he would take a “temporary leave of absence” from the firm, Greenberg Traurig LLP, and would work to bring a quick end to Robert Mueller’s investigation into whether Trump associates aided what the U.S. has said was Russia’s efforts to influence the outcome of...
